entry.title: WIND WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 04:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: E 57 km/h gust 75 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
